template.name: Template SNMP PowerMTA
template.description: Zabbix SNMP Template for PowerMTA by AlwindB 2017

item.name: activeConnIn
item.description: The number of currently active incoming SMTP connections.

item.name: activeConnOut
item.description: The number of currently active outgoing SMTP connections.

item.name: aliasQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the alias queues.

item.name: aliasQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the alias queues.

item.name: aliasQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the alias queues.

item.name: bounceProcessorQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the bounceProcessor queues.

item.name: bounceProcessorQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the bounceProcessor queues.

item.name: bounceProcessorQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the bounceProcessor queues.

item.name: cpuCount
item.description: The number of CPUs.

item.name: cpuType
item.description: The CPUs' type.

item.name: discardQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the discard queues.

item.name: discardQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the discard queues.

item.name: discardQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the discard queues.

item.name: domainNamesCached
item.description: The number of cached domain names.

item.name: domainNamesPending
item.description: The number of domain names waiting for resolution.

item.name: feedbackLoopProcessorQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the feedbackLoopProcessor queues.

item.name: feedbackLoopProcessorQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the feedbackLoopProcessor queues.

item.name: feedbackLoopProcessorQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the feedbackLoopProcessor queues.

item.name: fileQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the file queues.

item.name: fileQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the file queues.

item.name: fileQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the file queues.

item.name: fullHostName
item.description: The machine's full host name.

item.name: lastHourBouncesProcessed
item.description: Number of bounces processed in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourFeedbackLoopProcessed
item.description: Number of feedback loop mails processed in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourKBytesIn
item.description: KBytes received in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourKBytesOut
item.description: KBytes sent in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourMessagesIn
item.description: Number of messages received in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourMessagesOut
item.description: Number of messages sent in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourRecipientsIn
item.description: Number of receipients received in the last hour.

item.name: lastHourRecipientsOut
item.description: Number of recipients sent in the last hour.

item.name: lastMinuteBouncesProcessed
item.description: Number of bounces processed in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteFeedbackLoopProcessed
item.description: Number of feedback loop mails processed in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteKBytesIn
item.description: KBytes received in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteKBytesOut
item.description: KBytes sent in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteMessagesIn
item.description: Number of messages received in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteMessagesOut
item.description: Number of messages sent in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteRecipientsIn
item.description: Number of receipients received in the last minute.

item.name: lastMinuteRecipientsOut
item.description: Number of recipients sent in the last minute.

item.name: licenseComment
item.description: A comment to the license.

item.name: licenseCopyright
item.description: The copyright notice of the license.

item.name: licenseExpires
item.description: The expiration date of the license.

item.name: licenseIssued
item.description: The date the license was issued.

item.name: licenseLicensee
item.description: The owner of the license.

item.name: licenseOptions
item.description: The licensed options of the product.

item.name: licensePlatform
item.description: The platform this license is for.

item.name: licenseProduct
item.description: The product the license is for.

item.name: licenseSerial
item.description: The serial number of the license."

item.name: licenseUnits
item.description: The units of the license.

item.name: licenseVersion
item.description: The version of the product the license is for.

item.name: maxConnIn
item.description: The maximum number of incoming SMTP connections.

item.name: maxConnOut
item.description: The maximum number of outgoing SMTP connections.

item.name: osBuild
item.description: The build of the operating system.

item.name: osName
item.description: The name of the operating system.

item.name: osVersion
item.description: The version of the operating system.

item.name: pipeQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the pipe queues.

item.name: pipeQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the pipe queues.

item.name: pipeQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the pipe queues.

item.name: ramReal
item.description: The amount of physical RAM.

item.name: runStatus
item.description: The current run status of the MTA.

item.name: smtpQueueDomains
item.description: The number of domains in the SMTP queue.

item.name: smtpQueueKBytes
item.description: The number of KBytes in the SMTP queue.

item.name: smtpQueueRcpt
item.description: The number of recipients in the SMTP queue.

item.name: spoolDirs
item.description: The number of directories in the spool.

item.name: spoolFilesInUse
item.description: The number of spool files currently in use.

item.name: spoolFilesRecycled
item.description: The number of recycled spool files.

item.name: spoolFilesTotal
item.description: The total number of spool files.

item.name: spoolInitialization
item.description: The percentage of the spool initialization.

item.name: spoolMaxRcp
item.description: The maximum number of recipients the spool can contain.

item.name: spoolTotalRcp
item.description: The total number of recipients the spool contains.

item.name: startupTime
item.description: The date and time when the MTA was started.

item.name: timeNow
item.description: The current date and time.

item.name: topConnIn
item.description: The highest number of incoming SMTP connections seen at any point in time.

item.name: topConnOut
item.description: The highest number of outgoing SMTP connections seen at any point in time.

item.name: topPerHourBouncesProcessed
item.description: Maximum number of bounces processed in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourFeedbackLoopProcessed
item.description: Maximum number of feedback loop mails processed in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourKBytesIn
item.description: Maximum KBytes received in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourKBytesOut
item.description: Maximum KBytes sent in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourMessagesIn
item.description: Maximum number of messages received in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourMessagesOut
item.description: Maximum number of messages sent in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourRecipientsIn
item.description: Maximum number of receipients received in an hour.

item.name: topPerHourRecipientsOut
item.description: Maximum number of recipients sent in an hour.

item.name: topPerMinBouncesProcessed
item.description: Maximum number of bounces processed in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinFeedbackLoopProcessed
item.description: Maximum number of feedback loop mails processed in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinuteKBytesIn
item.description: Maximum KBytes received in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinuteKBytesOut
item.description: Maximum KBytes sent in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinuteMessagesIn
item.description: Maximum number of messages received in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinuteMessagesOut
item.description: Maximum number of messages sent in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinuteRecipientsIn
item.description: Maximum number of receipients received in a minute.

item.name: topPerMinuteRecipientsOut
item.description: Maximum number of recipients sent in a minute.

item.name: totalBouncesProcessed
item.description: Total number of bounces processed.

item.name: totalFeedbackLoopProcessed
item.description: Total number of feedback loop mails processed.

item.name: totalKBytesIn
item.description: Total KBytes received.

item.name: totalKBytesOut
item.description: Total KBytes sent.

item.name: totalMessagesIn
item.description: Total number of messages received.

item.name: totalMessagesOut
item.description: Total number of messages sent.

item.name: totalRecipientsIn
item.description: Total number of receipients received.

item.name: totalRecipientsOut
item.description: Total number of recipients sent.

item.name: userString
item.description: The user string of the MTA.
